message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay no more than $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position. While I appreciate your offer, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to come down to $1200000. This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I understand your position, but I'm still not willing to pay $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1150000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but $1150000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1250000, which is a fair price considering the value of the product.  I think this is a good compromise for both of us. Let me know what you think.
I understand your compromise, but I'm still not willing to pay $1250000. I'm willing to go up to $1170000, but no more. I think this is the highest I can go and still stay within my budget.
